commit.message:
Run the sevenbridges integration tests in gitlab. (#70)

* Add HTTP client for the SevenBridges QA broker

* Add `uses_sb_broker` test filter

* Add `production_only` test filter

* Add tests for SevenBridges integration with BDC

* Update gitlab-ci.yml to run seven bridges tests.

* Cruft.

* Permissions.

* Run anywhere.

* Cruft.

* Cruft.

* Update Dockerfile based on .gitlab-ci.yml

* Avoid installing dependencies in CI jobs

CI docker image has everything pre-installed.

* Fix `make lint` execution

* Prevent "before_script" overrides

* Use the `variables` key instead of `export`

https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/ci/variables/#create-a-custom-cicd-variable-in-the-gitlab-ciyml-file

Also deduplicate some staging job keys.

* Separate dockerfiles. (#76)

* 2Dockerfiles

* Tested Dockerfile.

* Update image.

Co-authored-by: Toni Ruža <toni.ruza@sbgenomics.com>
